42ea494e-f61a-4022-9c3a-86b140d914a5.description: Earners of Digital Media Essentials have developed an introductory knowledge of the digital media industry. They are competent in understanding the history of digital advertising, the basic skills needed to talk about programmatic, the differences between a direct buy and programmatic, and introduction knowledge of setting objectives and proper key performance indicators.
42ea494e-f61a-4022-9c3a-86b140d914a5.name: Digital Media Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 90-minute self-paced eLearning course and take a test.

1182758e-b4a9-4816-a0ef-c135f85b953b.description: Earners of Programmatic Essentials have gained a fundamental understanding of programmatic advertising. They are well versed in their understanding of the history of programmatic, real-time bidding, strategies, tactics, and where the industry is headed.
1182758e-b4a9-4816-a0ef-c135f85b953b.name: Programmatic Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 75-minute self-paced eLearning course and take a test.

b4050a3d-190e-4de4-8ac3-aaf34d72075b.description: Earners of Search Essentials have developed a fundamental understanding of how paid search works. They have knowledge in the basics of how to set up a paid search campaign, the fundamental ideas of keywords and quality scores, and the differences between the search platforms.
b4050a3d-190e-4de4-8ac3-aaf34d72075b.name: Search Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 2-hour self-paced eLearning course and take a test.

b3801c0b-7947-45f7-a2c7-b572cdc0aebc.description: Earners of Data Essentials have gained a fundamental understanding of the main concepts of data in advertising. This includes the state of data today, a high-level overview of the main advertiser identifiers, the differences between first, second, and third-party data, and how to activate on audiences. Earners would have also developed an understanding of how data works with advertising campaigns to target audiences and measure performance.
b3801c0b-7947-45f7-a2c7-b572cdc0aebc.name: Data Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 60-minute, self-paced eLearning course and take a test.

8a22efbe-84b3-4662-bff8-020299207910.description: Earners of Basis Foundations have developed the foundational skills needed to buy and execute media in Basis or any other Demand-Side Platform. They are competent in skills such as setting up campaigns including the following elements - utilizing proper bidding strategies, incorporating cross device, custom segments to Basis understanding of optimizing campaigns using manual and machine learning levers.
8a22efbe-84b3-4662-bff8-020299207910.name: Basis Foundations

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 100% on-demand training or a combination of on-demand and live training sessions, and take a test. Live training sessions require you to complete 2 self-paced eLearning courses, meet with Centro experts live a total of 4x, 2 hours at a time.

aeacfdd6-1489-465e-8f6e-ed0885e8e1b5.description: Earners of Direct Buying Essentials have gained a fundamental understanding of the benefits of running a guaranteed direct buy, what the differences are between a direct and programmatic buy and how to strategically work with both type of buys in campaigns. Earners would have also walked away with the best practices of direct buying and negotiating tactics.
aeacfdd6-1489-465e-8f6e-ed0885e8e1b5.name: Direct Buying Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: Take a 45-minute self-paced e-learning course, take a test

ed3dd741-9fd4-4e54-bc31-670195fdecd6.description: Earners of this course have gained a fundamental understanding of what contextual targeting is and how it works, learned the different types of contextual partners available, examples of how to use contextual targeting, and what the future holds.
ed3dd741-9fd4-4e54-bc31-670195fdecd6.name: Contextual Targeting Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 60-minute self-paced eLearning course and take a test.

84fac840-55cd-4c6a-ba5c-ec4baf255309.description: Earners of Basis Foundations 2.0 have developed a deep understanding of the skills needed to buy and execute media in Basis or any other Demand-Side Platform. They are competent in skills such as setting up campaigns that require advanced retargeting setups, video, mobile, audio, and native. Buyers are able to take their optimization skills to the next level by reviewing all levels of data to make the next best move to maximize performance.
84fac840-55cd-4c6a-ba5c-ec4baf255309.name: Basis Foundations 2.0

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 100% on-demand training or a combination of on-demand and live training sessions, and take a test. Live training sessions require you to complete 2 self-paced eLearning courses, meet with Centro experts live a total of 4x, 2 hours at a time.

6fa4011c-17ba-45d2-9c80-95481e9aae95.description: Earners of this course have gained a fundamental understanding of what a Private Marketplace is and the benefits, as well as an awareness of its growth and why they are important.
6fa4011c-17ba-45d2-9c80-95481e9aae95.name: Private Marketplace Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 25-minute self-paced eLearning course and take a test.

35d13f61-f511-4a79-85de-8fe507eb76b3.description: Earners of this course have gained a fundamental understanding of what a Connected TV (CTV) is and its benefits, how it works, learned the different types of ad placements and inventory available, as well as the basics to set up a CTV ad campaign.
35d13f61-f511-4a79-85de-8fe507eb76b3.name: Connected TV (CTV) Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 30-minute e-learning self-paced course, take a test

c2e322ff-c871-4470-b1fe-e49496b0228f.description: Earners of this course have gained a fundamental understanding of what first-party data is, what third-party data is, what behavioral targeting is, what cross-device targeting is and why it’s important.
c2e322ff-c871-4470-b1fe-e49496b0228f.name: Data

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 20-minute self-paced eLearning course.

74eb0354-b55d-470a-85dd-42cedc793033.description: Earners of this course have gained a fundamental understanding of what a marketing funnel is, programmatic tactics, first-party data and third-party data.
74eb0354-b55d-470a-85dd-42cedc793033.name: Digital Media Strategist

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 30-minute self-paced eLearning course.

a68a19c7-60e1-415f-9370-f14bd485166e.description: Earners of this course have gained a fundamental understanding of what a Connected TV (CTV) is and its benefits, how it works, learned the different types of ad placements and inventory available, as well as how to maximize Basis and its partners to create an effective CTV ad campaign.
a68a19c7-60e1-415f-9370-f14bd485166e.name: Connected TV (CTV) Essentials: Basis User Edition

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 60-minute self-paced eLearning course and take a test.

a965fb9c-5083-45a8-b280-6a532c9acaca.description: Earners of this course have developed an introductory knowledge of the marketing funnel. They are competent in understanding the stages of the funnel, how a consumer’s decision-making process lines up with each stage, and how to identify which KPIs and digital advertising campaign tactics are most appropriate and effective.
a965fb9c-5083-45a8-b280-6a532c9acaca.name: Marketing Funnel Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 1-hour e e-learning self-paced course, take a test

c1788b47-5116-4806-aa32-a153294b467b.description: Earners of the Digital Media Associate learning path have developed a fundamental understanding of the marketing funnel, the leading ad types used in the industry, the most common terms used for digital advertising, the different pricing models that exist, and the programmatic ecosystem.
c1788b47-5116-4806-aa32-a153294b467b.name: Digital Media Associate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 45-minute self-paced eLearning course.

334580d3-6604-4685-bc63-ce1391d3b093.description: Earners of BDSP Foundations have developed the foundational skills needed to buy and execute media in Basis or any other Demand-Side Platform. They are competent in skills such as setting up campaigns including the following elements - utilizing proper bidding strategies, incorporating cross-device, custom segments to Basis understanding of optimizing campaigns using manual and machine learning levers.
334580d3-6604-4685-bc63-ce1391d3b093.name: BDSP Foundations

badge_template_activities.title: Take self-paced eLearning courses with a test at the end.

76c024dc-7461-4604-957c-d5bc6a20bb8d.description: Earners of this course have gained a fundamental understanding of what a programmatic guaranteed (PG) deal is and how they fit into the programmatic landscape, its benefits, current usage in the industry, and how to execute PG deals in Basis.
76c024dc-7461-4604-957c-d5bc6a20bb8d.name: Programmatic Guaranteed (PG) Essentials: Basis User Edition

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 60-minute self-paced eLearning course and take a test.

7f0e9fc4-6a08-4b5a-84b7-15c617ccda8a.description: Earners of the Programmatic learning path have developed an understanding of what programmatic is, how programmatic and real-time bidding work together, the different technologies within programmatic, and the programmatic ecosystem.
7f0e9fc4-6a08-4b5a-84b7-15c617ccda8a.name: Programmatic

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 40-minute self-paced eLearning course.

e0487907-468f-41dd-89e1-affa532e1e7c.description: Earners of this course have gained a fundamental understanding of how to define objectives and correlate KPIs, the most common terms are and pricing models, the landscape of programmatic, and the main aspects of manual optimization.
e0487907-468f-41dd-89e1-affa532e1e7c.name: Digital Media Buyer

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 45-minute self-paced eLearning course.

aefadaac-2ca5-4f26-85ed-a00b3df5c976.description: Earners of this course have gained a fundamental understanding of the difference between first price and second price auction, what header bidding is, what bid shading is and why it's important.
aefadaac-2ca5-4f26-85ed-a00b3df5c976.name: Bidding

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 40-minute self-paced eLearning course.

dd57770a-0f59-49f1-8047-188342f2f661.description: Earners of this course have gained a fundamental understanding of what a programmatic guaranteed (PG) deal is and how they fit into the programmatic landscape, its benefits, and its current usage in the industry.
dd57770a-0f59-49f1-8047-188342f2f661.name: Programmatic Guaranteed (PG) Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 40-minute self-paced eLearning course and take a test.

cbc92a2b-ec66-463c-8245-152ee4e5f8b9.description: Earners of BDSP Foundations 2.0 have developed a deep understanding of the skills needed to buy and execute media in Basis or any other Demand-Side Platform. They are competent in skills such as setting up campaigns that require advanced retargeting setups, video, mobile, audio, and native. Buyers are able to take their optimization skills to the next level by reviewing all levels of data to make the next best move to maximize performance.
cbc92a2b-ec66-463c-8245-152ee4e5f8b9.name: BDSP Foundations 2.0

badge_template_activities.title: Take self-paced eLearning courses with a test at the end.

317155c4-2bc0-4c59-b9d8-7abea8fa4f43.description: Earners of this course have gained a strong, foundational working knowledge of programmatic buying by applying best practices and creating an efficient strategy that maximizes Basis’ full buying power.
317155c4-2bc0-4c59-b9d8-7abea8fa4f43.name: Programmatic Strategy 101

badge_template_activities.title: Register and attend this full day of workshopping, networking, and learning from Basis subject matter experts.

a25c422b-a1a9-4286-bf7c-4f999afb0d69.description: Earners of the Tactic learning path have gained a fundamental understanding of the different tactics you can use, what they do, and how they can help you with different objectives & KPIs.
a25c422b-a1a9-4286-bf7c-4f999afb0d69.name: Tactics

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 45-minute self-paced eLearning course.

0c009069-4eae-4ff2-8de2-47130cb6f0c2.description: Earners of the Basis DSP tactics learning path have developed a fundamental understanding of the following tactics: prospecting, location targeting, retargeting, contextual targeting, behavioral targeting, first-party data targeting, setting up connected TV campaigns, and private marketplaces.
0c009069-4eae-4ff2-8de2-47130cb6f0c2.name: Basis DSP Tactics

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 60-minute self-paced eLearning course.

e55c3d5e-9574-4663-be66-830bb364d5f9.description: Earners of this course have gained a fundamental understanding of the 3 main stages every optimization goes through as well as how to maximize campaign performance by understanding when and how to use Machine Learning Optimization (MLO), Algorithmic Optimization (AO), and the Group Budget Optimization (GBO) feature in Basis.
e55c3d5e-9574-4663-be66-830bb364d5f9.name: Optimizations

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 60-minute self-paced eLearning course.

362468f6-bc29-446b-9e90-4f9bd7be25a4.description: Earners of this course have gained a fundamental understanding of the difference between first-price and second-price auctions, what header bidding is, the difference between bid shading and bid multipliers, and recommendations on starting bids.
362468f6-bc29-446b-9e90-4f9bd7be25a4.name: Basis Bidding

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 45-minute self-paced eLearning course.

80ba7240-3ae9-4ffb-a505-a32351f78697.description: Earners of this course have gained a fundamental understanding of the different campaign and DSP reports available in Basis, what each type of report is used for, how to optimize campaigns using data from these reports and how to customize the data you're viewing.
80ba7240-3ae9-4ffb-a505-a32351f78697.name: Basis Reporting

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 1-hour self-paced eLearning course.

a43b55de-a261-481e-8ee1-347c569727bf.description: Earners of this course have gained a strong, foundational working knowledge of the programmatic landscape and a baseline understanding of how programmatic media can complement any existing strategy so as to drive revenue growth.
a43b55de-a261-481e-8ee1-347c569727bf.name: Programmatic Business Growth

badge_template_activities.title: This certification covers: The history of digital advertising; the emergence of programmatic technology and how it can complement your existing media mix; how to identify programmatic media; what targeting options are available for each digital objective; and a programmatic playbook that will illustrate what to listen for when talking with your clients, the questions you should ask, and the recommended targeting/creative/KPIs for every part of the marketing funnel

1adad0f3-3f2d-4e54-a492-ab648b4ced6a.description: Earners of this course have gained a fundamental understanding of how the message center can help you communicate internally & externally, how & when to use comments, and how Basis Assistant can help you across platforms
1adad0f3-3f2d-4e54-a492-ab648b4ced6a.name: Collaboration & Communication

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 25-minute self-paced eLearning course.

482b30e7-d1c1-4156-95d3-7c719b759432.description: Earners of this course have gained a fundamental understanding of the features within Basis Platform that generate efficiencies across media planning, performance, and measurement.
482b30e7-d1c1-4156-95d3-7c719b759432.name: Basis Automate+

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 1-hour self-paced eLearning course.

1460eefe-fc45-4bb3-b061-db725d443aa4.description: Earners of this course have gained a strong, foundational working knowledge of Basis features that will elevate their campaigns.
1460eefe-fc45-4bb3-b061-db725d443aa4.name: Basis Elevate

badge_template_activities.title: Register and attend this full day of workshopping, networking, and learning from Basis subject matter experts.

4a8b9cc2-4c85-461a-8aa7-80d7386d0054.description: Earners of this course have gained a fundamental understanding of the features and core competencies within Basis Platform that generate efficiencies across media planning,
4a8b9cc2-4c85-461a-8aa7-80d7386d0054.name: Basis Planner

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 1-hour self-paced eLearning course.
